form_data.client_vision: We want an intimate, cozy wedding celebration in Bangalore with close family and friends. Focus on quality over quantity with excellent food and beautiful photography. We prefer traditional South Indian and North Indian cuisine with vegetarian options only. The ambiance should be elegant with traditional decorations in red, gold, and maroon colors.
form_data.special_traditions: Traditional South Indian wedding rituals, Saptapadi ceremony, Mangalsutra ceremony
form_data.must_haves: Excellent vegetarian food, professional photography, traditional decorations, live classical music
form_data.avoid_elements: Non-vegetarian food, overly modern decor, loud DJ music, alcohol service
form_data.catering_special_requirements: 100% vegetarian menu, traditional South Indian breakfast, North Indian dinner, no alcohol service, Jain food options available
form_data.service_requirements: Traditional wedding coordination, priest coordination, decoration setup, photography coordination
form_data.religious_requirements: Hindu wedding rituals, priest services, traditional ceremonies
form_data.cultural_preferences: South Indian traditions, classical music, traditional attire encouraged

notes: Traditional Indian wedding with focus on vegetarian cuisine and cultural authenticity. Client prefers intimate celebration with high-quality vendors and traditional elements.
